attributes.action: +*+*+ BAN the sale of ALL LIVE ANIMALS via petshops & chainstores, with only licensed & registered breeders with regularly unannounced inspection of those breeders being the source of animals as pets in the UK +*+*+
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most people are unaware of the cruel, cramped & insanitary conditions mass farmed pets & sadley "feeder" animals are housed in.  Animals ranging from dogs & cats to guinea pigs, rabbits & fancy rats etc. Many animals who have been "farmed" in these conditions suffer deformities, poor health & shorter lifespans because of the way they have entered the world & because of deficient gene lineage not addressed by farm style breeders...Many of these pets also find themselves as needless "live food" for reptiles such as snakes as pet shops do not home check potential purchasers...Live feeding is cruel & needless...
Please help stop this unjustifiable suffering...Stop the sale of live animals from pet shops...  Please sign the petition & make your voice heard...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
